text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier, seynd dato folgende zwey Bücher zu haben, so in Nancy durch Subscriptions gedruckt worden.
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionnaire Universel- Francois & Latin, Vulgairement appellé Dictionaire de Trevoux</TITLE>
    <NOTE>avec des Remarques d’Erudition & de Critique</NOTE>
    <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>fl. 24</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Oeconomique, continant les moyens d'Augmenter son bien & de conserver sa santé</TITLE>
    <AUTHOR>Mister Noel Chomel</AUTHOR>
    <NOTE>Augmenté d'un Nouveau Supplément de deux Volumes</NOTE>
    <AUTHOR>F. Marset, Doct. en Médecines</AUTHOR>
    <FORMAT>avec fig.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>fl. 18</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  So dann sind bey ihnen auch genugsam annoch zu haben:
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Historique & Critique de Mr. Bayle</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1740</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>L. 27</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Corpus Juris Civilis Romani, cum Notis Gotofrest</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1740</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>fl. 10. 48. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Royal, Francois-Allemand-Latin, par le R. P. Fr. Pomey</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4°.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>fl. 5. 24. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"1) Added XML declaration and proper indentation.
2) Escaped all ampersands (& → &) to keep the XML well-formed.
3) Wrapped free descriptive phrases in <NOTE> tags instead of leaving them as loose text inside <BIBL>.
4) Corrected malformed word fragments ("2vec fig." → "avec fig.").
5) Normalised price tag: replaced <PRICE> with <PRIZE> for consistency.
6) Fixed mismatching closing tag </PRICE> → </PRIZE> in the last <BIBL> block.
7) Removed stray full stops that were placed outside closing tags, keeping punctuation inside the surrounding text nodes.
8) Re-encoded odd characters (e.g. 4 √≤. → 4°.) and replaced mis-encoded diacritics to valid UTF-8 where possible."}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier, seynd dato folgende zwey Bücher zu haben, so in Nancy durch Subscriptions gedruckt worden.
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionnaire Universel- Francois & Latin, Vulgairement appellé Dictionaire de Trevoux</TITLE>
    <NOTE>avec des Remarques d’Erudition & de Critique</NOTE>
    <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>fl. 24</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Oeconomique, continant les moyens d'Augmenter son bien & de conserver sa santé</TITLE>
    <AUTHOR>Mister Noel Chomel</AUTHOR>
    <NOTE>Augmenté d'un Nouveau Supplément de deux Volumes</NOTE>
    <AUTHOR>F. Marset, Doct. en Médecines</AUTHOR>
    <FORMAT>avec fig.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>fl. 18</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  So dann sind bey ihnen auch genugsam annoch zu haben:
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Historique & Critique de Mr. Bayle</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1740</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>L. 27</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Corpus Juris Civilis Romani, cum Notis Gotofrest</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1740</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>fl. 10. 48. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Dictionaire Royal, Francois-Allemand-Latin, par le R. P. Fr. Pomey</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4°.</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1741</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>fl. 5. 24. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Added XML declaration and proper indentation.
2) Escaped all ampersands (& → &) to keep the XML well-formed.
3) Wrapped free descriptive phrases in <NOTE> tags instead of leaving them as loose text inside <BIBL>.
4) Corrected malformed word fragments ("2vec fig." → "avec fig.").
5) Normalised price tag: replaced <PRICE> with <PRIZE> for consistency.
6) Fixed mismatching closing tag </PRICE> → </PRIZE> in the last <BIBL> block.
7) Removed stray full stops that were placed outside closing tags, keeping punctuation inside the surrounding text nodes.
8) Re-encoded odd characters (e.g. 4 √≤. → 4°.) and replaced mis-encoded diacritics to valid UTF-8 where possible.
